gui.title: KoishiNetDisk
main.opt.all:
Usage for extra argumentsï¼š<option> <extra arguments>
Such as: {0} --target /home/knet_downloads --upload --address 114:114:5:14 -r
main.opt.recursive: {0} - Recursive upload/download all the files and directories in the specified paths.
main.opt.target:
{0} - Specify the target directory for download/upload, that means the files downloaded/uploaded will be stored in it.
			If this is not specified, the files will be stored in /files of the working dir.
